SocialMediaPosting.headline: Miss Tristin Croyle’s Story - Pittsburgh Student - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope for all learners to be accepting of one another and to be appreciative of the world of art…”

– Miss Tristin Croyle, Art Education Student @IUPedu https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/all-learners-acceping-one-another-appreciative-world-art/
